hCard 2 - multiple occurrence test

This page was design to test that values of a hcard which are can have multiple occurrences are parsed correctly.

From: hCard test suite 1.0

Author: Glenn Jones

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vcard[0].adr[1] HasProperty(true) The adr (address) is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].email[1] HasProperty(true) The class is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].org[1] HasProperty(true) The org is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].tel[1] HasProperty(true) The tel is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].agent[1] IsEqualTo("Dave Doe") The agent is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].category[1] IsEqualTo("development") The category is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].key[0] IsEqualTo("hd02$Gfu*d%dh87KTa2=23934532479") The key is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].label[1] IsEqualTo("West Street, Brighton, United Kingdom") The label is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].logo[1] IsEqualTo("http://www.ufxtract.com/testsuite/images/logo.gif") The logo is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].mailer[1] IsEqualTo("Outlook 2007") The mailer is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].nickname[1] IsEqualTo("Lost boy") The nickname is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].note[1] IsEqualTo("It can be a real problem booking a hotel room with the name John Doe.") The note is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].photo[0] IsEqualTo("http://www.ufxtract.com/testsuite/images/photo.gif") The photo is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].sound[0] IsEqualTo("Pronunciation of my name") The sound is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].title[1] IsEqualTo("Owner") The title is a optional multiple value
vcard[0].url[1] IsEqualTo("http://www.webfeetmedia.com/") The url is a optional multiple value

History:

  • Created: 8 April 2008 by Glenn Jones
  • Updated: 7 May 2008 by Glenn Jones - Changed incorrect test values for logo, photo and key properties

About:

John Doe is one of those names you always have issues with.
